sentences.sContent: I’ve put your name on the list and I don’t foresee any problems.
sentences.sCn: 我把你的名字写在名单上了，估计不会有什么问题。

sentences.sContent: The disaster could not have been foreseen.
sentences.sCn: 这场灾难是始料未及的。

remMethod.val: fore(预先) + see(看见) →预先看见 → 预见

trans.tranOther: to think or know that something is going to happen in the future
